typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		country as string,
		country_code as string,
		year_week as string,
		new_cases as string,
		tests_done as string,
		population as string,
		testing_rate as string,
		positivity_rate as string,
		testing_data_source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SourceTesting
source(output(
		country as string,
		country_code_2_digit as string,
		country_code_3_digit as string,
		continent as string,
		population as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> LookupCountry
source(output(
		date_key as string,
		date as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		day as string,
		day_name as string,
		day_of_year as string,
		week_of_month as string,
		week_of_year as string,
		month_name as string,
		year_month as string,
		year_week as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> LookupWeekdate
SourceTesting, LookupCountry lookup(SourceTesting@country == LookupCountry@country,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CountryLookup
CountryLookup select(mapColumn(
		country = LookupCountry@country,
		country_code_2_digit,
		country_code_3_digit,
		year_week,
		tests_done,
		testing_rate,
		new_cases,
		positivity_rate,
		testing_data_source,
		population = LookupCountry@population
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRequired
LookupWeekdate derive(ecdc_year_week = year + '-W' + lpad(week_of_year,2,'0')) ~> DerivedData
DerivedData aggregate(groupBy(ecdc_year_week),
	week_start_date = min(date),
		week_end_date = max(date)) ~> AggregateData
SelectRequired, AggregateData join(year_week == ecdc_year_week,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinData
JoinData select(mapColumn(
		country,
		country_code_2_digit,
		country_code_3_digit,
		year_week,
		tests_done,
		testing_rate,
		new_cases,
		positivity_rate,
		testing_data_source,
		population,
		week_start_date,
		week_end_date
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectReqd
SelectReqd sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DataSink
